channel.title: Vindictive - The New ERA of 317
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]Welcome to Vindictive 317![/size][/b][/center] [center]Website - http://vindictiversps.x10.mx/index.php[/center] [center]NOTE: We are still in beta, there still might be some bugs we have to work out, thanks![/center] [center][color=limegreen][size=14pt]Features -[/size][/center] [center]Money Pouch Lots of Bosses Lots of Minigames Many NPCs To Kill No Dupes Lottery System Squeal of fortune 24 Skills Perfect switching Tons of Bosses and Minigames Ticket exchange Fully working nex Ragefire, steadfast and glaiven boots Clipped firemaking Bank pins Dwarf multi cannon Automatic username&password saving + A LOT MORE![/center]

item.title: Vindictive - The New ERA of 317
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:14, topic:517842”]Here are four sets of skilling bugs…fix these and I will test some more. I don’t like to beta test a whole lot until the programmer can prove they aren’t an idiot.(no offense but if you are an actual programmer I am sure you can understand my reasoning )

[hr]

vindictive bugs:

Mining:

-iron pickaxe animation not used when using that pickaxe
-really need a rune rock in the mining area…(even though there is one at catherby lol)
-mining facing needs to be worked on ( can minm from a diagnol position )

Smithing:

-hammer not required at anvil
-work a little on evening out mining vs. smithing experience. At low levels it’s okay but at higher levels your going to have to mine a lot extra to get that 99 smithing(unless of course you have bars in summoning store which is just a big no no for a skilling eco.)

Fishing:

-you have a lure/bait fishing spot but no equipment for it/can’t fish it
-when you fish with the small net it shows a white net in the animation may want to update that
-can’t use “bait” option on the fishing spot where you fish shrimp
-as far as I can tell you don’t fish faster when you get a higher level in specific fish
-not really a bug but fishing seems a little slow…half an inventory of shrimp only got me to 28
-unless I am wrong(which I don’t think I am…) you should be able to fish tuna at 35 fishing however I have a harpoon in my inventory and it states I need one to fish them.
-the “bait” shop that is by itself cannot be fished
-sometimes fishing animations mess up lets say if you was fishing shrimps and you quickly click another spot nearby you still show the net but could be fishing lobster
-sometimes starts to try to fish tuna @45 fishing however it still gives the harpoon message (it should never start to do a skilling animation before it checks level etc)

Cooking:

-at the door at guild to go use range you “go through” the door instead of opening/closing it properly
-cooking experience vs fishing experience way way too high even that out
-cooking burning rates seem off
-about that door again…you have to be right there at it to even go through it
-you are able to cook fish outside the wall of the cooking room in the guild[/quote]
Thanks for the feedback! I will get working on them ASAP

Read full topic

item.title: Vindictive - The New ERA of 317
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

Here are four sets of skilling bugs…fix these and I will test some more. I don’t like to beta test a whole lot until the programmer can prove they aren’t an idiot.(no offense but if you are an actual programmer I am sure you can understand my reasoning )

[hr]

vindictive bugs:

Mining:

-iron pickaxe animation not used when using that pickaxe
-really need a rune rock in the mining area…(even though there is one at catherby lol)
-mining facing needs to be worked on ( can minm from a diagnol position )

Smithing:

-hammer not required at anvil
-work a little on evening out mining vs. smithing experience. At low levels it’s okay but at higher levels your going to have to mine a lot extra to get that 99 smithing(unless of course you have bars in summoning store which is just a big no no for a skilling eco.)

Fishing:

-you have a lure/bait fishing spot but no equipment for it/can’t fish it
-when you fish with the small net it shows a white net in the animation may want to update that
-can’t use “bait” option on the fishing spot where you fish shrimp
-as far as I can tell you don’t fish faster when you get a higher level in specific fish
-not really a bug but fishing seems a little slow…half an inventory of shrimp only got me to 28
-unless I am wrong(which I don’t think I am…) you should be able to fish tuna at 35 fishing however I have a harpoon in my inventory and it states I need one to fish them.
-the “bait” shop that is by itself cannot be fished
-sometimes fishing animations mess up lets say if you was fishing shrimps and you quickly click another spot nearby you still show the net but could be fishing lobster
-sometimes starts to try to fish tuna @45 fishing however it still gives the harpoon message (it should never start to do a skilling animation before it checks level etc)

Cooking:

-at the door at guild to go use range you “go through” the door instead of opening/closing it properly
-cooking experience vs fishing experience way way too high even that out
-cooking burning rates seem off
-about that door again…you have to be right there at it to even go through it
-you are able to cook fish outside the wall of the cooking room in the guild

Read full topic

item.title: Vindictive - The New ERA of 317
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:12, topic:517842”]Once again, I don’t understand why this is called a ‘317’ when it includes shit from higher revisions. It makes absolutely no sense.

Let’s say for example, that you have a glass of unsweet tea. You add sugar to the tea. You sell that same tea as ‘unsweet tea’. That is essentially what you’re doing here.[/quote]

It’s just loading a higher game frame and item, I feel if he portrayed it any higher than a 317 it would just look stupid. I’ve never seen Trisidia revised as a 600+?

Read full topic

item.title: Vindictive - The New ERA of 317
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Once again, I don’t understand why this is called a ‘317’ when it includes shit from higher revisions. It makes absolutely no sense.

Let’s say for example, that you have a glass of unsweet tea. You add sugar to the tea. You sell that same tea as ‘unsweet tea’. That is essentially what you’re doing here.

Read full topic

item.title: Vindictive - The New ERA of 317
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

nolan2131:

This actually looks pretty descent. Smooth and Clean. Good luck!

Thanks

Lots of Bosses
Lots of Minigames

No Dupes
Lottery System

Perfect switching
Tons of Bosses and Minigames
Ticket exchange
Fully working nex
Ragefire, steadfast and glaiven boots

Bank pins
Dwarf multi cannon
Automatic username&password saving
